name: David Davinci
review: I’m an office manager for a small business here in Birmingham, AL and we’ve noticed a great increase in calls and leads since we started working with KEY2DESIGN. KEY2DESIGN designed us an awesome website and now handles all of our marketing. 10 stars all the way!

name: Bernice Bourgous
review: KEY2DESIGN is probably the most valuable component to my business. (And will be to yours, too). I have worked with Kimani for several years now and he is excellent to work with.  KEY2DESIGN has visionary, and the knowledge to make it happen. If you are a business owner, no matter the size, I highly suggest you compare with what you currently have to what KEY2DESIGN can offer you.
